description:
Job Title: Registered Veterinary Technician
Job Type: Full-time
Location: Turks and Caicos Islands
Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Registered Veterinary Technician to join our team at our small animal exclusive practice in the Turks and Caicos Islands. The ideal candidate should have a passion for animal care, excellent communication skills, and be able to work well in a team environment.
Responsibilities:

 Assist veterinarians with diagnostic procedures
 Perform routine checkups and other medical procedures on animals
 Coordinate the care of animals with other staff members
 Provide critical care nursing
 Triage patients
 Provide care before and after surgery by taking their vitals, performing phlebotomy duties, and providing intramuscular (IM), intravenous (IV) and subcutaneous (SQ) injections
 Process specimens in the in-house laboratory and submit specimens to outside laboratories
 Calculate medication dosages and provide dosage instructions for clients
 Enter patients’ service charges into the computer database and keep accurate patient records

Requirements:

 Must be a registered veterinary technician with at least 1 year experience
 Strong affinity for animals
 Outstanding people skills and a positive attitude
 Ability to multitask in a dynamic environment
 Willing to relocate

Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $55,000.00-$65,000.00 per year
Benefits:

 Casual dress
 Disability insurance
 On-site parking
 Paid time off
 Store discount

Schedule:

 Monday to Friday
 On call
 Weekends as needed

Application question(s):

 Are you able to relocate to the Caribbean and do you have a current passport?

Do you have a Registered Veterinary Technician Certificate?Are you self motivated?Can you lift 50lbs?
Education:

 AEC / DEP or Skilled Trade Certificate (required)

Experience:

 veterinary technician: 1 year (required)

Work Location: In person
Expected start date: 2024-01-01
